message.content:
I need to identify the specific line items and value of cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets from the given cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see the "Cash Flow from Investing Activities" section. Within this section, there is a line item "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with an amount of 528936.17. This represents the cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment (fixed assets) for the period ending 2024-01-29.

This is the value I need to extract as it represents the cash outflow for acquiring long-term assets.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '528936.17'}}
```
